thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I required advice regarding my current shower as it had become faulty. In a quick discussion the fault was diagnosed and a relacement shower, able to fit the "footprint" of the faulty one, was recommended. This also had the bonus of being on offer so was very cost effective. The order process was straightforward and the new shower arrived les than 2 days later.
